document.docAuthor: Chang, Zhi-Min, Yang, Lin, Zhang, Zheng-Guang & Chen, Xiang-Sheng
document.docTitle: Neotetricodes longispinus Chang et Chen, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Neotetricodes Zhang et Chen (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Issidae) with description of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Neotetricodes Zhang et Chen (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Issidae) with description of two new species

heading.emphasis:
Neotetricodes longispinus Chang et Chen
, sp. nov.

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Measurements. Body length (from apex of vertex to tip of tegmina): male 6.5–6.7 mm (N= 4 ), female 6.9 –7.0 mm (N= 2 ); Tegmen: male 5.5–5.6 mm , female 5.8–5.9 mm .

Type material.
Holotype : ♂, Ailao Mountain National Nature Reserve (
24 ° 12 ´N
,
101 ° 19 ´E
), Yuxi, Yunnan Province, China ,
21 July 2012
, W.-B. Zheng, W.-C. Yang ( IEGU ); paratypes : 2 ♂♂, 2 ♀♀, same data as holotype ( IEGU );
1 ♂
, 1 ♀, same data as holotype ( BMNH ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–13. Neotetricodes species: (Figs 1, 3, 5 – 7) male adult, dorsal view; (Figs 2, 4) same, lateral view; (Figs 8 – 13) hind tibiae. (Figs 1 – 2, 8):
N. longispinus Chang et Chen
,
sp. nov.
; (Figs 3 – 4, 9):
N. xiphoideus Chang et Chen
,
sp. nov.
; (Figs 5, 10–11):
N. clavatus Chen, Zhang et Chang, 2014
; (Figs 6, 12):
N. kuankuoshuiensis Zhang et Chen, 2012
; (Figs 7, 13):
N. quadrilamina Zhang et Chen, 2012
. Scale bars = 0.5 mm.

FIGURES 14–23.
N. longispinus Chang et Chen
,
sp. nov.
. Male. 14. Head and thorax, dorsal view; 15. Head, ventral view; 16. Head and thorax, lateral view; 17. Tegmen; 18. Hind wing; 19. Male genitalia, lateral view; 20. Genital style, lateral view; 21. Anal segment, dorsal view; 22. Aedeagus and phallobase, lateral view; 23. Aedeagus and phallobase, ventral view. a — hamulate processes, b — long processes. Scale bars = 0.5 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Etymology. Specific epithet is derived from the presence of the long processes in aedeagus.
